CodeBlockMethod.Name: UnderAttack
CodeBlockMethod.Code: if _UserService.LocalPlayer.Common.is_left == false and self.Entity.Common.is_left == false then -- 블랙윙팀 공격받을 때 알림 self.BlackUI_Back.Enable = true self.BlackUI_Back.SpriteGUIRendererComponent.Color.a = 1 self.BlackUI_Front.SpriteGUIRendererComponent.Color.a = 1 self.BlackUI_Front.TextComponent.FontColor.a = 1 wait(2) self.BlackUI_Back.SpriteGUIRendererComponent.Color.a = 0.5 self.BlackUI_Front.SpriteGUIRendererComponent.Color.a = 0.5 self.BlackUI_Front.TextComponent.FontColor.a = 0.5 wait(2) self.BlackUI_Back.SpriteGUIRendererComponent.Color.a = 0 self.BlackUI_Front.SpriteGUIRendererComponent.Color.a = 0 self.BlackUI_Front.TextComponent.FontColor.a = 0 elseif _UserService.LocalPlayer.Common.is_left == true and self.Entity.Common.is_left == true then -- 레지스탕스팀 공격받을 떄 알림 self.RegiUI_Back.Enable = true self.RegiUI_Back.SpriteGUIRendererComponent.Color.a = 1 self.RegiUI_Front.SpriteGUIRendererComponent.Color.a = 1 self.RegiUI_Front.TextComponent.FontColor.a = 1 wait(2) self.RegiUI_Back.SpriteGUIRendererComponent.Color.a = 0.5 self.RegiUI_Front.SpriteGUIRendererComponent.Color.a = 0.5 self.RegiUI_Front.TextComponent.FontColor.a = 0.5 wait(2) self.RegiUI_Back.SpriteGUIRendererComponent.Color.a = 0 self.RegiUI_Front.SpriteGUIRendererComponent.Color.a = 0 self.RegiUI_Front.TextComponent.FontColor.a = 0 end

CodeBlockMethod.Name: OnDestroy
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
self.system.WinPage_Open:Open() self:WinObj() local left_win = true if self.Entity.Common.is_left == true then self.system.WinnerText:Result_Black() elseif self.Entity.Common.is_left == false then self.system.WinnerText:Result_Regi() left_win = false end
local delayHide = function() self.Entity:SetEnable(false) self.DestroyEffect.Enable = true end
_TimerService:SetTimerOnce(delayHide, self.DestroyDelay) wait(1) self.DestroyEffect.Enable = false local win = {} local lose = {} local win_point = {} local lose_point = {} for k,v in pairs(_UserService.UserEntities) do if(left_win) then if(v.Common.is_left) then table.insert(win,v.PlayerComponent.Nickname) table.insert(win_point,self.system.RankingComponent:search_rank(v.PlayerComponent.Nickname)) else table.insert(lose,v.PlayerComponent.Nickname) table.insert(lose_point,self.system.RankingComponent:search_rank(v.PlayerComponent.Nickname)) end else if(v.Common.is_left == false) then table.insert(win,v.PlayerComponent.Nickname) table.insert(win_point,self.system.RankingComponent:search_rank(v.PlayerComponent.Nickname)) else table.insert(lose,v.PlayerComponent.Nickname) table.insert(lose_point,self.system.RankingComponent:search_rank(v.PlayerComponent.Nickname)) end end end self.system.RankingComponent:ELO(win[1],win[2],win_point[1],win_point[2],lose[1],lose[2],lose_point[1],lose_point[2])

CodeBlockMethod.Name: WinObj
CodeBlockMethod.Code: if self.Entity.Common.is_left == true then self.Regi.Enable = true elseif self.Entity.Common.is_left == false then self.Black.Enable = true end

CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleHitEvent
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code: -- Parameters local AttackCenter = event.AttackCenter local AttackerEntity = event.AttackerEntity local Damages = event.Damages local Extra = event.Extra local FeedbackAction = event.FeedbackAction local IsCritical = event.IsCritical local TotalDamage = event.TotalDamage -------------------------------------------------------- if self:IsClient() then return end if AttackerEntity.Common.is_left ~= self.Entity.Common.is_left then self:UnderAttack() end
